mapper.select: SELECT po.*, ptt.output_type AS output_type_name FROM project_outputs po INNER JOIN project_tasks pt ON po.task_code = pt.task_code INNER JOIN project_output_types ptt ON po.output_type_code = ptt.output_type_code WHERE pt.task_code = #{taskCode} ORDER BY ptt.output_type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO project_outputs VALUES(ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{outputName}, #{outputUser}, (SELECT sysdate FROM dual), #{outputPath}, #{outputTypeCode}, #{taskCode})
